org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.server.cloudfoundry.config

Class CloudFoundryServerConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.server.cloudfoundry.config.CloudFoundryServerConfigurationProperties

  • @Validated
 @ConfigurationProperties(value="spring.cloud.dataflow.server.cloudfoundry")
public class CloudFoundryServerConfigurationProperties
extends Object
    ConfigurationProperties class to configure various settings of Data Flow running on Cloud Foundry.
    Author:
    Eric Bottard
